title: The Nothing Series
description: I always dreamed about going on tour with my favorite band The Nothing. That dream was about to come reality. I wish my best friend Chloe was here with me. It was one of her dreams too. Chloe... The screeching sound of metal starts to fill my ears. My vison turns black. I feel my body flailing around like a rag doll. Chloe's screaming in my ears. It's haunting. I hear a deafening crunch and then Chloe's screams stop.Read This on Wattpad now! https://www.wattpad.com/story/8503606...
author: Jessica Carson
